description.narrative: Oxfam is an international NGO with extensive programme management experience following international standards. It has all the procedures, systems, safeguards and integrity management in place to implement safe and quality programming with innovative edge and comply with the donor requirements. It will provide a multi-disciplinary specialist team consisting of SME development expert with experience in promoting public-private collaboration, international market access advisor, gender specialist, labour rights specialist, MEL specialist, knowledge management and ICT4D specialist. The programme lead team will work under the strategic guidance of senior management engaged in high level policy influencing platforms at national level. In addition, Oxfam will mobilise where necessary its network of Oxfam International SME support and Private Sector Engagement Global Advisors to bring in broader international experience. Oxfam will take a leading role in the comprehensive support for agri-MSEs, increase their market linkage, influencing cooperation of government agencies and business associations. Oxfam will play the leading and coordinator role for activities around organizing and facilitating multi-stakeholder dialogue and using GALS tools. As lead applicant, Oxfam will take overall management and coordination responsibility.

participating-org.narrative: In Vietnam , Oxfam is one of the leading international, non -governmental organisation. Since 1955, Oxfam is active in Vietnam withhumanitarian interventions and started development work in the late 1980's. Today, Oxfam works in 26 provinces with people, governments and civil society to promote equality and well-being through social and economic change.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to a sustainable livelihood
